column4: I just installed my latest fx drivers and i restarted and it went into low graphics mode, so i had to manualy configure my monitor model and fx drivers, and then i reboot but 3d acceleration is not active, so i enable it and it tells me to restart so i do and it goes back to low graphics mode, im stuck in a loop, if this helps after installing the drivers under nvidia xserver settings, when i open it it says, You do not appear to be u
install automatix2 is more easy to instal nvidia drivers
automatix2 is not working on ubuntu hardy
any other solutions to the earlier issue then
